availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William G. Fleming (Fleming County, Kentucky, clerk, deputy sheriff, sheriff, and hotel clerk)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, clerk and sheriff. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas W. Fleming and Emily F. Fleming. Married to Joanna Fleming. Father of Thomas F. Fleming. Clerk in Fleming County, Kentucky, in 1850. Deputy sheriff in Fleming County in 1860. Deputy sheriff in Fleming County in 1861. Sheriff in Fleming Countyuntil November 10, 1862. Hotel clerk in Fleming County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Flemingsburg, p. 259B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 2, p. 625.
Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861, Legislative Document Series, No. 1 (Frankfort, KY: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862), 95.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Fleming County, KY, September 1863, p. 125.
"William G. Fleming (1832-1873)," Find A Grave, Memorial #214612216, accessed September 20, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/214612216.
KYR-0001-031-0040.
